item.title: Red Black Tree : An Intuitive Approach
item.description: Red Black Tree : An Intuitive Approach You can find the original writing in this GitHub Repo Monologue I remember when the first time I studied Red Black Tree (RBT) , it was an enigma . A seemingly random rotations and colorings seems to somehow balance a Binary Search Tree (BST) . But I had no intuition for why these rotations and colorings seem to magically balance the BST .
